turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Morning! Could you order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which location are you near this morning?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am in Midtown

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so I'll order from the Starbucks on Poplar Avenue, ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. I would like a Black and white Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which size mocha did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll get a grande today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so a grande black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you what it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot, it's cold out today!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you want whipped cream on the top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and cinnamon too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want me to order now for pickup or wait until later.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I have a grande black and white mocha with whipped cream and cinnamon hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: SHould i charge that to your Visa.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I should have that to your office within 20 minutes. Ill text your receipt to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
